summary: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.
cast: Jennifer Lawrence|Max Thieriot|Elisabeth Shue|Gil Bellows|Eva Link|Nolan Gerard Funk|Allie MacDonald|Jordan Hayes|Krista Bridges|James Thomas|Hailee Sisera|Craig Eldridge|Jonathan Higgins|Olivier Surprenant|Lori Alter|Joy Tanner|Bobby Osborne|Grace Tucker-Duguay|Will Bowes|Jon McLaren|John Healy|Jasmine Chan|Jonathan Malen|Claudia Jurt|Jordan Blais|Miles Carney|Matthew Champ|Lisa Cumming|Kate Drummond|Paul Finnigan|Jordan Krakower|Jake McDowell|Jolanta Mojsej|Steve Rahaman|Quinnie Vu|Gregory Wilson
keywords: dead body in a car trunk|female captive|scantily clad female|slut|nipples visible through clothing
title: La casa al final de la calle
